DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation local tolerance cosmetic efficacy topical skin care formulation healthy female participant mild advanced photo-damaged facial skin undergone 70 % Glycolic Acid facial peel procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Cosmetic Benefit Skin Cream Healthy Females With Mild Advanced Photo-damaged Facial Skin Who Have Undergone Glycolic Acid Facial Peel Procedure .
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , evaluator-blind , single-center two-arm clinical study design evaluate local tolerance cosmetic efficacy topical skin care formulation healthy female participant mild advanced photo-damaged facial skin undergone 70 % Glycolic Acid facial peel procedure .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Demonstrates understand study procedure , restriction willingness participate evidenced voluntary write informed consent receive sign date copy inform consent form . Females age 30 60 year inclusive . Good general mental health , opinion investigator medically qualify designee clinically significant relevant abnormality medical history upon physical examination . Willingness actively participate study attend schedule visit . Skin type : ) Fitzpatrick phototype IIIV . b ) Participants Glogau photoaging type IIIII . Females childbearing potential , opinion investigator , practise reliable method contraception . Adequate contraception define abstinence , oral contraceptive , either combined progestogen alone injectable progestogen implant levonorgestrel estrogenic vaginal ring percutaneous contraceptive patch intrauterine device intrauterine system double barrier method ( condom occlusive cap [ diaphragm cervical vault cap ] plus spermicidal agent [ foam , gel , film , cream , suppository ] ) male partner sterilization prior female participant 's entry study , male sole partner participant . Exclusion Criteria Women know pregnant intend become pregnant duration study . Women breastfeed . ) Active skin disease open wound test area b ) Medical history use medicate acne treatment ( e.g . Benzoyl Peroxide , Clindamycin , isotretinoin ) within last 24 month , c ) Medical history dysplastic nevus melanoma , ) Preexisting inflammatory dermatosis psoriasis , atopic dermatitis , e ) Moles , tattoo , scar , irritated skin , hair , etc . test area could , opinion investigator , influence investigation , e ) Systemic therapy immunosuppressive drug ( e.g . corticosteroid ) and/or antihistamine within 7 day prior screen and/or throughout entire course study , g ) Systemic use overthecounter ( OTC ) analgesic antiinflammatory drug 24 hour prior screen , h ) Systemic use photosensitize medication 2 week prior screen , ) Intense sun exposure , UVtreatments tan salon visit within two week prior screen , j ) One follow illness might require regular systemic medication : Insulindependent diabetes , cancer k ) One follow illness medicate : Asthma , hypertension , l ) Medical history abnormal response sunlight , ) Participants history mental illness , n ) Ocular surgery within last 12 month , ) Ocular trauma , infection inflammation within last 3 month , p ) Active blepharitis , conjunctivitis , uveitis , q ) Any ocular pathology require topical ocular treatment within last 1 month , r ) Ocular laser within last 3 month , ) Aesthetic , cosmetic dermatological treatment treatment area ( face ) , include use skin tone lightning product , within last 3 month , ) Use facial scrub , depilatory cream , wax and/or bleach within last 2 week prior screen , u ) Microdermabrasion and/or laser hair removal within last 4 week prior screen , v ) Medical history Herpes Simplex ( Cold Sores ) . ) Known suspect intolerance hypersensitivity study material ( closely relate compound ) state ingredient , b ) Documented allergy cosmetic product study ingredient . ) Participation another clinical study ( include cosmetic study ) receipt investigational drug within 30 day screen visit , b ) Previous participation study . Recent history ( within last 5 year ) alcohol substance abuse . An employee sponsor study site member immediate family . ) Required work outside daylight hour duration study , b ) Required otherwise intend spend prolong period time outside daylight hour duration study ( e.g . holiday , sunbathe , garden ) . A score `` Severe '' Dermatologist Participant SelfAssessed endpoint time study material sensitivity test .
